text.language: Palin maren]ho e~Vnou] pipantokratwr ~Viwt m~Pen[oic: ouoh Pennou] ouoh Pencwt/r I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
Again, let us ask God the Pantocrator, the Father of our Lord, God and Savior Jesus Christ,

language.div: Sekali lagi, marilah kita memohon kepada Tuhan Pantokrator, Bapa Tuhan kita, Tuhan dan Juruselamat Yesus Kristus,

text.language: وأيضا نسأل الله ضابط الكل أبا ربنا وإلهنا ومخلصنا يسوع المسيح.
Piw~ou nak nemaf nem Pip~neuma eyouab: eym/n e~bol sae~neh: je qen oumetreferpeynanef nem ouhap n~te v~mou: ouoh anerk~l/ronomin m~mof a~non nem pengenoc qen genea~ niben nem genea~.

Glory to You with Him and the Holy Spirit forever, for through Your beneficence and righteous judgment, You have brought upon us the sentence of death, and we and our race have inherited it from generation to generation,

language.div: Kemuliaan bagi-Mu bersama Dia dan Roh Kudus selamanya, karena melalui kebaikan dan penilaian-Mu yang benar, Engkau telah menjatuhkan hukuman mati atas kami, dan kami serta keterunan kami telah mewarisinya dari generasi ke generasi,

text.language: لك المجد معه والروح القدس الدائم إلى الأبد، لأنك بإحسانك وحكمك العادل جلبت علينا حكم الموت، وورثناه، نحن وجنسنا من جيل إلى جيل.
Ouoh afhwmi e~jwn a~non qa nio~mi n~te p~kahi nem nii~ten n~te nis~yeh.
and it has trampled upon us, we who are the mud of the earth and the dust of the streets.

language.div: dan itu telah menginjak-injak kami, kami yang adalah lumpur tanah dan debu jalanan.

text.language: وقد داس علينا طين الأرض وتراب الشوارع
Ouoh answpi qen p~ersisi n~te v~mou eybe ]a~povacic n~te pihioui~ e~p~hap qen oucwouten n~te pihap n~dikeon.
And we became under the authority of death by reason of the sentence of being cast into condemnation according to the uprightness of the just judgment.
Dan kami menjadi berada di bawah kuasa maut karena hukuman dijatuhkan ke dalam penghukuman menurut kebenaran penghakiman yang adil.
وصرنا تحت سلطان الموت من أجل قضية السقوط في الدينونة بموجب استقامة الحكم العادل،
je anernobi e~rok qen penouws eybe oumetjaji n~hof n~ar,eoc: alla akswpi nan n~oubo/~yoc nem ouref]nom] qen oumoun e~bol hiten han p~rov/t/c nem hany~m/i.
For we have sinned against You of our own will through the enmity of the ancient serpent. But You have become continuously our helper and our comforter through the prophets and the righteous (men).

language.div: Karena kami telah berdosa melawan Engkau atas kehendak kami sendiri melalui permusuhan dari ular tua. Tapi Engkau terus menerus menjadi penolong dan penghibur kami melalui para nabi dan orang-orang kudus.

text.language: لأننا أخطأنا إليك بإرادتنا من أجل عداوة الحية القديمة. لكن قد صرت لنا معينا ومعزيا بلا فتور من قبل الأنبياء والصديقين.
Ouoh qen t~qae~ n~te nie~hoou akouwnh e~ron qen ouc~poud/ nem oufirwous n~te oumetrefsenh/t.
And in the last days, You have manifested Yourself to us with zeal and pitying compassion,
Dan di hari-hari terakhir, Engkau telah menyatakan Diri-Mu kepada kami dengan semangat dan belas kasihan, dan mengingat kami,
وفي آخر الأيام ظهرت لنا بنشاط واهتمام ورافة وتحنن.
Ouoh akerpenmeui~ a~non qa n/ethemci qen p~,aki nem t~q/ibi m~v~mou.
and remembered us, we who were sitting in darkness and the shadow of death,

language.div: kami yang duduk dalam kegelapan dan bayang-bayang kematian,

text.language: وذكرتنا نحن الجلوس في الظلمة وظلال الموت
Hiten pekmonogen/c n~s/ri I/couc Pi,~rictoc Pencwt/r: pimairwmi n~referpeynanef.
through Your only-begotten Son, our Savior, the beneficent, Lover of Mankind.
melalui Putra Tunggal-Mu, Juruselamat kami, yang dermawan, Kekasih Umat Manusia.
من قبل ابنك الوحيد يسوع المسيح مخلصنا محب البشر صانع الخيرات،
V/e~tafkwrf m~p~a~mahi m~v~mou hiten pefmou n~reftanqo hijen pise eyouab n~te pic~tauroc: e~tafmou men qen t~carx e~taf[itc n~q/ten.
Who brought to naught (or destroyed) the dominion of death through His life-giving death upon the holy wood of the cross, when He died in the flesh which He has taken from us.

language.div: Yang memusnahkan (atau menghancurkan) kekuasaan maut melalui kematian-Nya yang memberi hidup di atas kayu salib yang suci, ketika Dia mati dalam daging yang telah diambil-Nya bagi kami.

text.language: الذي أبطل سلطان الموت بموته المحيي على خشبة الصليب المقدس لما مات بالجسد الذي أخذه متنا.
Ouoh pih~of n~ar,eoc afqomqem n~tefcouri nem tefjom e~bolha p~genoc n~]metrwmi t/rc: ouoh afaiten n~remhe n~kecop.
And the ancient serpent, He has crushed its thorn and its power off the race of men, and made us free again.

language.div: Dan ular tua, Dia telah meremukkan - duri dan kekuatannya dari keterunan manusia, dan membuat kami bebas lagi.

text.language: والحية القديمة قد سحق شوكتها وقوتها عن جنس البشر. وصيرنا أحرارا مرة أخرى
Ouoh anerremhe e~bolha ]metbwk: a~non qa nirefernobi.
And He made us free from slavery, we the sinners.
Dan Dia membebaskan kami dari perbudakan, kami orang-orang berdosa..
وعتقنا من العبودية نحن الخطاة.
Ouoh aners/ri m~piouwini ouoh n~k~l/ronomoc n~te na niv/oui nem ni,oroc n~te t~ve.
And made us sons (or children) of the light and heirs of the heavenly (things) together with the choir of the heavenly.

language.div: Dan menjadikan kami putra (atau anak-anak) dari cahaya dan pewaris surga bersama dengan paduan suara surgawi.

text.language: وصيرنا أبناء النور ووارثين السمائيات مع صفوف السمائيين
Ouoh n~s~v/ri n~remsemsi qen ]t~axic n~te ]ekkl/cia n~te nisorpm~mici qen handogma n~oryodoxoc: nem oucunaxic n~aggelikon: nem pihumnoc n~te hana~cwmatoc.
And partners in the service of the order of the church of the firstborn, in orthodox doctrines, the angelic assemblies and the hymns of the incorporeal.

language.div: Dan mitra dalam pelayanan tatanan gereja anak sulung, dalam doktrin ortodoks, majelis malaikat dan himne inkorporeal.

text.language: ومشاركين في خدمة الطقوس التي لكنيسة الأبكار بالأوامر الأرثوذكسية والتقديسات الملائكية وتسابيح غير المتجسدين.
Eybe vai ten]ho ouoh tentwbh m~mok pimairwmi eybe pekbwk (nim) pidia~kwn.
Therefore, we ask and entreat You, O Lover of Mankind, for Your servant (...) the deacon,

language.div: Oleh karena itu, kami meminta dan memohon kepada-Mu, O Pencinta Umat Manusia, untuk hamba-Mu diaken(...),

text.language: فلهذا نسأل ونطلب إليك يا محب البشر من أجل عبدك (...) الشماس،
Vai e~tafvwt harok: ouoh afswpi qen oumetatcwma: ouoh n~semmo e~bol qen pikocmoc.
who has fled unto You and became bodiless and estranged from the world.
yang telah kembali kepada-Mu dan menjadi tidak bertubuh dan terasing dari dunia.
هذا الذي أتى إليك وصار في غير الجسد وغريبا في العالم.
Swp e~rok n~y/e~te ywf m~'u,/ qen outoubo nem oumeym/i.
Receive unto You his soul in purity and truth,

language.div: Terimalah jiwanya kepada-Mu dalam kemurnian dan kebenaran,

text.language: اقبل إليك نفسه بطهارة وبر.
Mv~r/] e~tafswpi n~refsemsi m~pekyuci~ac t/rion hijen pikahi marefswpi efoi n~refsemsi n~te t~ve: pima e~te m~mon a[ni n~q/tf oude ywleb efnaswpi efrana m~pekouws eyouab ouoh m~makarion.

and even as he was a servant of Your earthly altar, may he become also a servant of Your heavenly altar, the place in which there is no spot or blemish. May he take delight in Your holy and blessed will.

language.div: dan sama seperti dia adalah hamba mezbah duniawi-Mu, semoga dia juga menjadi hamba mezbah surgawi-Mu, tempat di mana tidak ada noda atau cela. Semoga dia senang dengan kehendak-Mu yang suci dan diberkati.

text.language: وكما كان خادما لمذبحك الأرضي فليكن أيضاً خادما لمذبحك السمائي حيث لا عيب فيه ولا دنس وليكن مرضيا لإرادتك المقدسة الطوباوية
Ouoh icje afer h~li n~nobi e~rok hwc rwmi ,w naf e~bol a~ricun,wrin m~mwou naf e~bol.
And if he had sinned against You as a man, forgive and pardon him.

language.div: Dan jika dia telah berdosa terhadap-Mu sebagai manusia, ampunilah dan ampunilah dia.

text.language: وان كان أخطأ إليك في شئ كالبشر فاغفر له وسامحه بها
Je n~yok ouna/~t ouoh n~refsenh/t ouoh n~y~m/i ouoh n~referpeynanef n~ouon niben e~tercebecye m~mok.
For You are merciful and compassionate, just and beneficent to all who worship You.

language.div: Karena Engkau penyayang dan adil dan penuh kasih bagi semua yang menyembah-Mu.

text.language: لأنك أنت رحيم ورؤوف وبار ومحسن لكل الذين يعبدونك،
Je m~mon mou sop n~neke~biaik alla ouw~teb e~bol qen v~mou e~qoun e~p~wnq.
For there is no death for Your servants but a departure from death unto life.
Karena tidak ada kematian bagi hamba-hamba-Mu melainkan keberangkatan dari kematian menuju kehidupan.
لأنه لا موت يكون لعبيدك بل انتقال من الموت إلى الحياة،
Ouoh m~mon mou near[oic e~ron eybe v~mou m~pekmonogen/c n~s/ri I/couc Pi,~rictoc Pen[oic.
And death has no dominion over us because of the death of Your only-begotten Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

language.div: Dan maut tidak menguasai kami karena kematian Putra Tunggal-Mu Yesus Kristus Tuhan kami.

text.language: ولا يتسلط علينا موت من أجل موت ابنك الحبيب يسوع المسيح ربنا عنا
Je vwk pe piw~ou nemaf nem Pip~neuma eyouab n~reftanqo ouoh n~o~mooucioc nemak.
For Yours is the glory with Him and the Holy Spirit the life-giver, who is of one essence with You.

language.div: Karena milikMu adalah kemuliaan dengan Dia dan Roh Kudus pemberi hidup, yang satu esensi denganMu.

text.language: لأن لك المجد معه والروح القدس المحيي المساوي معك في الجوهر
}nou nem n~c/ou niben nem sa e~neh n~te nie~neh t/rou a~m/n.
Now and at all times and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
Sekarang dan setiap saat dan sampai segala zaman. Amin.
الآن وكل أوان وإلى دهر الدهور آمين.
Mv~r/] e~tauernis] n~je nekh~b/oui~ P[oic: akyamio~ n~hwb niben qen oucovia~: p~kahi meh e~bol qen pekcwnt.
How great are Your works, O Lord: in wisdom have You made all things; the earth is full of Your handiwork.
How great are Your works, O Lord: in wisdom have You made all things; the earth is full of Your handiwork.
ما أعظم أعمالك يارب، قد صنعت كل شئ بحكمة. الأرض مملوءة من خليقتك.
Nyok pe e~takerh~mot n~ouwnq ouoh on akeroikonomin n~oumou: ouoh cewnq t/rou qa totk n~je ouon niben etemp~sa n~tekmetnis].
You have bestowed life, and You again have ordained death: and with You, lives every one who is worthy of Your greatness.
You have bestowed life, and You again have ordained death: and with You, lives every one who is worthy of Your greatness.
أنت الذي وهبت الحياة ودبرت الموت، وكلهم أحياء عندك، أي كل الذين استحقوا عظمتك.
Nyok ounou] gar n~te n/etonq: ouoh n~yok eym/n e~bol qen oumetmakarioc n~atjwk eybe pie~mi e~qoun e~rok: vai e~taf]c~bw nan e~qoun n~je Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
For You are a God of the living, and of those who abide in infinite blessedness, through the knowledge of You, which our Lord Jesus Christ has taught us.
For You are a God of the living, and of those who abide in infinite blessedness, through the knowledge of You, which our Lord Jesus Christ has taught us.
أنت هو إله الأحياء وأنت الباقي الطوباوي بلا انتهاء، من أجل معرفتك التي أعلمنا بها يسوع المسيح.
Tenera~xioin en]ho e~rok eybe nenio] eyouab t/rou e~tauenkot.
We presume to entreat You for all our holy fathers, who have fallen asleep,
We presume to entreat You for all our holy fathers, who have fallen asleep,
نتضرع إليك ونسألك من أجل آبائنا كلهم الذين رقدوا،
Nem eybe pierv~meui~ eyouab n~te pekbwk (nim): v/e~tafi~ e~bol qen cwma ouoh efn/ou harok: Vnou] n~te piept/rf.
and for the holy remembrance of Your servant (...), who has departed from the body, and comes to You, O God of all,
and for the holy remembrance of Your servant (...), who has departed from the body, and comes to You, O God of all,
ومن أجل التذكار المقدس الذي لعبدك (فلان) هذا الذي خرج من الجسد وأتى إليك يا إله الكل،
Ouoh aftacyof e~pikahi v/e~tau[itf e~bol n~q/tf: ouparay/k/ eyouab ouoh m~makarion pe y/e~teywf m~'u,/.
and has returned to the earth from which he was taken. As for his soul, it is a holy and blessed charge+.
and has returned to the earth from which he was taken. As for his soul, it is a holy and blessed charge+.
وقد رجع إلى الأرض التي أخذ منها. أما نفسه فهي وديعة طاهرة طوباوية.
Mare oua~napaucic nem ou,~bob nem oum~ton swpi naf: outwter e~nanef marefswpi n~q/tc qen nic~kun/ n~te nekcwtp.
May he have repose, coolness and rest, and may he have a good standing+ in the tabernacles of Your elect.
May he have repose, coolness and rest, and may he have a good standing+ in the tabernacles of Your elect.
لتكن له راحة وبرودة ونياح . لتكن له درجة حسنة في مظال أصفيائك.

Marefers~v/r e~n/ t/rou e~tauersorp e~rof n~h~r/i qen pimeroc nem pik~l/roc n~te nia~hioc: nai e~tausasni e~roc qen niekk~l/cia~ n~te nisorp m~mici qen ]taxic n~te ]metou/b: pima on e~takws m~mof n~n/e~tauranak qen outoubo nem oumeym/i nem oucwouten n~te p~taho e~ratf hanrak: Vnou] n~te n/etonq t/rou.

May he be a partaker with all those who have gone before him, in the share and the inheritance of the saints who have attained—in the Church of the Firstborn— the order of the priesthood; the place You have promised unto those who have pleased You in purity, truth and uprightness before You, O God of all the living.

May he be a partaker with all those who have gone before him, in the share and the inheritance of the saints who have attained—in the Church of the Firstborn— the order of the priesthood; the place You have promised unto those who have pleased You in purity, truth and uprightness before You, O God of all the living.
ويشارك كل الذين سبقوه في نصيب وميراث القديسين الفائزين في كنيسة الأبكار برتبة الكهنوت، الموضع الذي وعدت به الذين أرضوك. ليكن قيامه أمامك في طهارة وبر واستقامة يا اله كل الأحياء.
Ouoh a~non hamn/ P[oic: p~roc oukouji n~c/ou pe tenmetremn~jwili hijen pikahi.
And we here, O Lord, but a little while is the time of our sojourn on earth.
And we here, O Lord, but a little while is the time of our sojourn on earth.
ونحن يارب فإنه قليل هو زمان غربتنا هنا على الأرض،
Areh e~ron e~bol ha kotc niben m~pon/ron ie f~[aqem etoi n~semmo e~pektoubo m~m/i: hina n~tenqwnt e~qoun e~pima eyouab n~tak: n~tensasni e~]metmakarioc n~te nekcwp qen paie~wn nem qen peyn/ou:

Preserve us from all evil machinations and uncleanness that is alien to Your true purity. That we may enter into Your holy place, and may attain to the blessedness of Your elect in this world and in the world to come.

Preserve us from all evil machinations and uncleanness that is alien to Your true purity. That we may enter into Your holy place, and may attain to the blessedness of Your elect in this world and in the world to come.
فاحفظنا من كل الفخاخ الشريرة النجسة الغريبة عن طهرك الحقيقي. لكي نقترب إلى موضع قدسك ونفوز بغبطة أصفيائك في هذا الدهر وفي الآتي.
Yai te tenhelpic a~non qa neke~biaik eynah] e~pekran eyouab: nem pekmonogen/c n~s/ri I/couc Pi,~rictoc Pen[oic nem Pip~neuma eyouab: ]nou nem n~c/ou niben nem sae~neh n~te nie~neh t/rou: a~m/n.
This is our hope, we Your servants, who believe in Your holy name, and Your only-begotten Son Jesus Christ our Lord and the Holy Spirit, now, and ever, and unto the age of ages. Amen.
This is our hope, we Your servants, who believe in Your holy name, and Your only-begotten Son Jesus Christ our Lord and the Holy Spirit, now, and ever, and unto the age of ages. Amen.
هذا رجاؤنا نحن عبيدك المؤمنين باسمك القدوس وابنك الوحيد يسوع المسيح ربنا والروح القدس الآن وكل أوان وإلى دهر الدهور آمين.
Vn/b P[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc pidimiorgoc n~te ]k~t/cic t/rc: v/e~te eybe p~a~sai n~te tekmeta~gayoc akera~ne,ecye e~swpi n~ar,/e~reuc.
O Master, Lord Jesus Christ, Co-Creator of all creation, who, according to the multitude of Your goodness endured to become High Priest
O Master, Lord Jesus Christ, Co-Creator of all creation, who, according to the multitude of Your goodness endured to become High Priest
أيها السيد الرب يسوع المسيح خالق الخليقة كلها. الذي بكثرة صلاحك احتملت أن تصير رئيس كهنة.
V/e~taferkocmin n~tefekk~l/cia~ eyouab qen hanh~mot nem hantogma eusebi/out.
Who have adorned Your holy church with graces and diverse dogmas,
Who have adorned Your holy church with graces and diverse dogmas,
الذي زين كنيسته المقدسة بالنعم والشرائع المختلفة.
Yai e~taksopc e~bol qen pekc~nof ettai/out p~roc p~cob] m~peklaoc.
this which You have acquired with Your precious blood for the confirmation of Your people.
this which You have acquired with Your precious blood for the confirmation of Your people.
هذه التي اشتريتها بدمك الكريم لإعداد شعبك.
M/ic nan eyrenerv~meui~ qen outoubo nem oumeym/i: eyren] nak P[oic n~hanw~d/ m~metrefseph~mot e~h~r/i e~jen nekh~b/oui~ t/rou.
Grant us that we may remember, in purity and truth, to offer unto You, O Lord, praises of Thanksgiving on behalf of all Your works+.
Grant us that we may remember, in purity and truth, to offer unto You, O Lord, praises of Thanksgiving on behalf of all Your works+.
امنحنا أن نتذكر بطهارة وعدل أن نقدم لك يارب تسابيح الشكر على جميع أعمالك.

comment.language: + Man as the custodian of God’s works (creation) is the one who offers thanks on behalf of these works.
+ Man as the custodian of God’s works (creation) is the one who offers thanks on behalf of these works.

text.language: Je n~yok gar pe penbo/~yoc ouoh pennas]: penrefnohem nem tenhelpic nem penoujai: tena~nactacic nem penwnq n~e~neh eucop.
For You are our helper and our protector and our Savior and our hope and our healing and our resurrection and our eternal life altogether
For You are our helper and our protector and our Savior and our hope and our healing and our resurrection and our eternal life altogether
لأن أنت عوننا وناصرنا. وخلاصنا ورجاؤنا وشفاؤنا. وقيامتنا وحياتنا الأبدية.
Nyok on ]nou pia~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi: ak,w n~outaxic n~nekyamio~ t/rou: n/e~tounau er~wou nem n/e~tencenau e~rwou an.
You, also now, O Good One and Lover of Mankind, have set orders for all Your creation, seen or unseen,
You, also now, O Good One and Lover of Mankind, have set orders for all Your creation, seen or unseen,
أنت الآن أيها الصالح محب البشر. جعلت رتبا لسائر مخلوقاتك التي ترى والتي لا ترى.
N/et qen niv/oui nem n/et hijen pikahi nem n/et capec/t e~p~kahi.
those in the heavens and those on earth and those beneath the earth.
those in the heavens and those on earth and those beneath the earth.
ما في السموات وما على الأرض وماتحت الأرض.
Malicta de on P[oic tekekk~l/cia~ n~cunk~l/tikoc: e~tak,ac hijen nenjij n~hanrefa~reh nem hanrefrwic nem hanmane~cwou.
And most particularly, O Lord, Your elect church which You have committed into the hands of guardians and watchers and shepherds
And most particularly, O Lord, Your elect church which You have committed into the hands of guardians and watchers and shepherds
ولاسيما يارب كنيستك الشريفة. التي وضعتها بأيدي حراس وساهرين ورعاة.
Eyroua~moni m~peklaoc ouoh n~touerkay/kin m~mwou: ouoh n~touswt e~bol m~picaji n~atsipi: ouoh n~toucob] nak n~hanlaoc nem hans/ri e~pekdipnon n~ep~ouranion.
that they may shepherd Your people and catechize+ them, and divide the word without reproach, and prepare for You, people and sons for Your heavenly banquet.
that they may shepherd Your people and catechize+ them, and divide the word without reproach, and prepare for You, people and sons for Your heavenly banquet.
لكي يرعوا شعبك ويعظوهم ويفصلوا الكلمة بغير خزى، ويهيئوا لك شعبا وأبناء لوليمتك السمائية.

comment.language: + Verb from catechumen and catechism. Alternatively, indoctrinate.
+ Verb from catechumen and catechism. Alternatively, indoctrinate.

text.language: Ten]ho ouoh tentwbj m~mok pimairwmi ouoh n~referpeynanef neman.
We ask and entreat You, O Lover of Mankind, and beneficent towards us, of the coming age.
We ask and entreat You, O Lover of Mankind, and beneficent towards us, of the coming age.
نسأل ونتضرع إليك يامحب البشر والمحسن إلينا.
Swp e~rok qen ouhir/n/ n~ouparay/k/ n~oujai: ouoh m~'u,/ m~makaria~ n~te peniwt n~a~gap/toc m~patriar,/c (ie m~etropolit/c ie n~e~pickopoc) abba (nim): vai e~tafi~ harok Vnou] etonq.
Receive unto You in peace this charge unto salvation even the blessed soul of our beloved patriarch (or metropolitan or bishop) Abba (...) who has come unto You, O living God.
Receive unto You in peace this charge unto salvation even the blessed soul of our beloved patriarch (or metropolitan or bishop) Abba (...) who has come unto You, O living God.
أقبل إليك بسلام هذه الوديعة الخالصة والنفس الطوباوية التي لأبينا المحب البطريرك (أو المطران أو الأسقف) أنبا (...) هذا الذي أتى إليك يالله الحي.
Icje n~yok pe pekoikonomoc e~naf,/ e~jen tekekk~l/cia~ eyouab: ouoh p~jwm n~tefmetoikonomoc ef,/ nemaf.
For he is Your steward who was over Your holy church, and the book of his stewardship is with him.
For he is Your steward who was over Your holy church, and the book of his stewardship is with him.
وإذ هو وكيلك لذي كان على كنيستك المقدسة وبيده كتاب وكالته
Moi naf n~oube,e n~e~pouranion nem outaxic e~nanef eyrefswpi n~s~v/ri nem n/e~tauersorp e~rof.
Grant him a heavenly reward and a good rank, that he may have a fellowship with them that have preceded him, those
Grant him a heavenly reward and a good rank, that he may have a fellowship with them that have preceded him, those
أعطه أجرا سمائيا ورتبة حسنة ليكون مشاركا للذين سبقوه
Ete nai ne nimane~cwou n~ref]c~bw: nai e~tausw] e~bol m~p~caji n~te ]meym/i qen oucwouten.
who are the shepherds and teachers who divided the word of truth in uprightness;
who are the shepherds and teachers who divided the word of truth in uprightness;
الذين هم الرعاة المعلمون. الذين فصلوا كلمة الحق باستقامة.
Ouoh eue~rouwini e~jen tekekk~l/cia~ m~piouwini n~a~liy/non n~te peke~mi m~m/i.
and illuminated Your church with the true light of Your true knowledge;
and illuminated Your church with the true light of Your true knowledge;
واضاءوا على كنيستك بالضياء الحقيقي الذي لمعرفتك الحقيقية
Nai e~tak[imwit nwou e~qoun e~pilim/n n~te piwnq n~e~neh eyn/ou qen nie~wn.
whom You have led into the harbor of eternal life
whom You have led into the harbor of eternal life
أولئك الذين هديتهم إلى ميناء الحياة الأبدية.
Ten]ho e~rok penn/b w~ptenhwn nemwou ouoh mam~ton nan nem p()ko~hi eyouab: e~tausasni e~pijino~hi e~ratf caoui~nak m~mok.
And we ask You, O our Master to number us with them, and give us rest with Your holy flock, who have attained to stand at Your right hand.
And we ask You, O our Master to number us with them, and give us rest with Your holy flock, who have attained to stand at Your right hand.
نسألك يا ملكنا أن تحسبنا معهم وتريحنا مع قطيعك المقدس الذين فازوا بالوقوف عن يمينك.
Ouoh a~riten n~emp~sa n~nieu,/ nem nip~recbua~: eyrenerpoliteuecye qen oumeta~riki nem oumetat[~rop.
And make us worthy of (their) prayers and intercessions that we may live blameless and without hindrance
And make us worthy of (their) prayers and intercessions that we may live blameless and without hindrance
وأهلنا للصلوات والشفاعات لنجاهد بغير انحراف ولا عثرة.
Hina n~tensemsi m~mok qen ouho]: n~tenjimi nemwou n~ouh~mot e~bol hitotk: ouoh n~tensasni e~neke~paggelia~ n~ats~tenywnou.
That we may serve You in fear and may attain to Your incomparable promises.
That we may serve You in fear and may attain to Your incomparable promises.
لكي نتعبد لك بمخافة، ونجد معهم نعمة من قبلك، ونفوز بمواعيدك التي لا مثيل لها،
Nyok pev~ref] n~nia~gayon n~e~neh: ouoh e~repiw~ou erp~repi nak nem Pekiwt n~a~gayoc nem Pip~neuma eyouab sae~neh a~m/n.
You are the giver of the eternal good things and to You is due the glory with Your good Father and the Holy Spirit, forever. Amen.
You are the giver of the eternal good things and to You is due the glory with Your good Father and the Holy Spirit, forever. Amen.
أنت هو معطي الخيرات الأبدية ويليق لك المجد مع أبيك الصالح والروح القدس إلى الأبد آمين.
Vnou] piatar,/ ouoh piatjwk pia~gayoc qen tefvucic: piatvwnh de ouoh piats~tahof.
O God who is without begining and without end, the Good One, by Your Nature, the unchangeable, the immoveable;
O God who is without begining and without end, the Good One, by Your Nature, the unchangeable, the immoveable;
الله الذي بلا بداية ولا نهاية، الصالح في طبيعته، غير المستحيل وغير المدرك
V/e~tafi~ni n~]k~t/cic t/rc n~no/~ton: ouoh acy/ton e~oujinswpi e~bolqen V/e~nafsop an: hiten pekmonogen/c n~s/ri Pen[oic ouoh Pennou] ouoh Pencwt/r ouoh Penouro t/ren I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
Who brought into existence from that which was not, all the rational and intelligent creation, through Your only-begotten Son, our Lord, God and Savior and king of us all, Jesus Christ;
Who brought into existence from that which was not, all the rational and intelligent creation, through Your only-begotten Son, our Lord, God and Savior and king of us all, Jesus Christ;
.الذي أتى بجميع الخليقة العاقلة والناطقة إلى الوجود مما لم يكن، بابنك الوحيد ربنا وإلهنا وملكنا كلنا يسوع المسيح،
V/e~takyamion e~bol hitotf e~jen oumetattako nem hanh~b/oui~ e~naneu.
through whom You have created us unto incorruption and good works;
through whom You have created us unto incorruption and good works;
الذي خلقنا به على غير فساد لأعمال صالحة.
Ouoh qen p~jiny~renmou hiten nenparap~twma m~min m~mon akcotten: ouoh akaiten m~beri n~kecop e~qoun e~ouhelpic n~te oua~nactacic n~te ouwnq n~e~neh.
and in our mortality through our own transgressions, You have redeemed us, and renewed us again to a hope of resurrection to eternal life;
and in our mortality through our own transgressions, You have redeemed us, and renewed us again to a hope of resurrection to eternal life;
وعندما متنا بواسطة زلاتنا الذاتية، خلصتنا وجددتنا مرة أخرى إلى رجاء قيامة الحياة الأبدية،
Eafswpi n~q~r/i n~q/tf n~oue~hoou n~te oucuntelia~ n~te paie~wn etsop ouoh hanar,/ n~te piwnq eyn/ou n~atjwk.
in which shall be the day of the end, of this present world and the beginning of the unending life that is to come;
in which shall be the day of the end, of this present world and the beginning of the unending life that is to come;
اليوم الذي فيه ينتهي هذا الدهر الحاضر وتبدأ الحياة الآتية التي بغير انتهاء

Vai e~te n~q~r/i n~q/tf niv/oui cenacini qen ouoi: nic~toi,ion de eue~rwkh cenabwl e~bol: p~kahi nem n/ t/rou e~te n~q/tf eue~kim: hote nirwmi e~takyamiw~ou icjen t~ar,/ m~picwnt eue~twounou euoi i~ attako: eue~]logoc qa n/e~tauaitou.

On which the heavens will pass away with a rush, and the elements will be burnt up and dissolved; the earth and all that are therein shall be shaken; when the men whom You have created from the beginning of creation shall be raised incorrupt to give account of what they have done.

On which the heavens will pass away with a rush, and the elements will be burnt up and dissolved; the earth and all that are therein shall be shaken; when the men whom You have created from the beginning of creation shall be raised incorrupt to give account of what they have done.
هذا الذي فيه تزول السموات بسرعة وتحترق العناصر أيضاً وتنحل الأرض ويضطرب كل ما فيها عندما يقوم البشر الذين خلقتهم منذ بدء الخليقة بغير فساد ويجاوبون عما صنعوا.
Ten]ho ouoh tentwbh m~mok pimairwmi: m~peri~ri neman kata nennobi: oude m~per]sebiw~ nan kata nena~nomia~: alla swpi nan n~ouref,w e~bol nem peklaoc: hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi n~refsenh/t.

We ask and entreat You, O Lover of Mankind, deal not with us according to our sins, neither reward us according to our iniquities, but be a forgiver unto us and Your people, as the Good One and a compassionate Lover of Mankind.

We ask and entreat You, O Lover of Mankind, deal not with us according to our sins, neither reward us according to our iniquities, but be a forgiver unto us and Your people, as the Good One and a compassionate Lover of Mankind.
نسأل ونطلب إليك يامحب البشر، لا تصنع معنا كخطايانا ولا تجازنا كآثامنا، بل كن غافرا لنا ولكل شعبك كصالح ومحب البشر الرؤوف.
Ariv~meui~ de on P[oic n~nenkeio] t/rou qen peknai: nem nenc~n/ou e~tauersorp n~enkot qen v~nah]: n~houo~ de P[oic pekbwk m~pouliteut/c ouoh n~dia~konict/c n~tak ouoh m~mona,oc (nim).
Remember also, O Lord, all our fathers in Your mercy, and our brethren who have already fallen asleep in the faith; and especially, O Lord, Your diligent and ministering servant and monk (...),
Remember also, O Lord, all our fathers in Your mercy, and our brethren who have already fallen asleep in the faith; and especially, O Lord, Your diligent and ministering servant and monk (...),
اذكر أيضاً يارب جميع آبائنا برحمتك، واخوتنا الذين سبق رقادهم في الإيمان، ولا سيما يارب عبدك المجاهد خادمك الراهب (...)
Vai e~taf,a cwma e~q~r/i m~v~r/] n~rwmi niben: ouoh afi sarok P[oic Vnou] n~te n/etonq.
who hath departed from the body after the manner of all men, and hath gone to You, O Lord, God of the living.
who hath departed from the body after the manner of all men, and hath gone to You, O Lord, God of the living.
هذا الذي خلع الجسد مثل سائر الناس، وأتى إليك أيها الرب اله الأحياء.
Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~nefhojhej nem nefpiracmoc e~tafsopou e~rof nem ]methaji n~te ]e~piyumia~: n~nekhip~ho m~mwou: je m~mon h~li n~hwb n~atbe,e nahrak.
Remember, O Lord, his afflictions and his temptations which he endured, and the snare of passion; despise them not, for nothing is unrewarded with You.
Remember, O Lord, his afflictions and his temptations which he endured, and the snare of passion; despise them not, for nothing is unrewarded with You.
أذكر يارب شدائده وتجاربه ومحاربات الشهوة التي قبلها ولا ترفض شيئا منها. لأنه لا يوجد عمل من الأعمال بغير أجر أمامك.
Ouoh afsanhei qen h~li n~nobi n~yok de hwc a~gayoc ouoh m~mairwmi e~takouahcahni m~pi,w e~bol n~nirwmi na nirwmi on: malicta n~yok P[oic piref,w e~bol.
And if he fell into any sins, You as the Good One and a Lover of Mankind have bidden the forgiveness by men of the offences of men; and You especially, O Lord, are the forgiver.
And if he fell into any sins, You as the Good One and a Lover of Mankind have bidden the forgiveness by men of the offences of men; and You especially, O Lord, are the forgiver.
وان كان قد سقط في شئ من الخطايا، فأنت أيها الصالح ومحب البشر قد أمرت بأن يغفر الناس للناس أيضاً، فكم بالحرى أنت أيها الرب الغافر.
Mare pefjinse e~qoun sarok swpi efersau qen ouoh n~at[isipi ekjw m~moc naf: je a~mwini haroi ouon niben etqoci ouoh a~nok eyna]emton nwten.
Let his departure to You be prosperous, with countenance unashamed, saying unto him, “Come to Me, all you who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.”
Let his departure to You be prosperous, with countenance unashamed, saying unto him, “Come to Me, all you who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.”
ليكن دخوله إليك مرضيا بوجه غير مخزى، اذ تقول له: تعالوا إلى ياجميع المتعبين وأنا أريحكم،
Ouoh taiu~mnologia~ e~tanouwrpc nak P[oic marecswpi n~oucy~oinoufi efs/p m~piekm~yo e~bol n~c/ou niben.
And let this praise which we offer unto You, O Lord, be an incense accepted before You at all times.
And let this praise which we offer unto You, O Lord, be an incense accepted before You at all times.
وهذا التمجيد الذي نرسله إليك يارب، ليكن مثل بخور مقبول أمامك في كل حين،
Ten]ho e~rok maemton n~tef'u,/ qen t~,wra n~te n/etonq: qen ouma n~ouwini: pima e~naf,/ m~mof n~je v~manswpi n~te n/e~tounof t/rou.
We ask You, give rest to his soul in the region of the living, in the place of light. the place that is the abode of all that rejoice.
We ask You, give rest to his soul in the region of the living, in the place of light. the place that is the abode of all that rejoice.
ونسألك أن تنيح نفسه في كورة الأحياء في موضع النور، حيث مسكن سائر الفرحين
Je ce,/ qatotk n~je ]moumi i~ te p~wnq nem pinai nem ]metmairwmi.
For with You is the fount of life and mercy and love towards mankind,
For with You is the fount of life and mercy and love towards mankind,
،لأن عندك ينبوع الحياة والرحمة ومحبة البشر
Ouoh e~re piw~ou erp~repi nak: Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma eyouab n~reftanqo.
And to You is due glory, O Father, with the Son, and the Holy life-giving Spirit.
And to You is due glory, O Father, with the Son, and the Holy life-giving Spirit.
ويليق بك المجد أيها الآب والابن والروح القدس المحيي، الآن وكل أوان وإلى دهر الدهور آمين.
}nou nem n~c/ou niben nem sa e~neh n~te nie~neh t/rou: a~m/n.
now and at all times and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
now and at all times and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
الآن وكل أوان وإلى دهر الدهور كلها. آمين.
Vnou] n~te nip~neuma ouoh P[oic n~te carx niben: v/e~te kata pefco[ni eth/p akhwtp n~]cu,/ nem picwma: palin kata pekouws n~a~gayoc akjwk e~bol m~pekp~lacma e~takyamiof.
God of spirits, and Lord of all flesh, who according to Your hidden counsel have united the soul and the body; and again according to Your good will have perfected Your creation which You formed.
God of spirits, and Lord of all flesh, who according to Your hidden counsel have united the soul and the body; and again according to Your good will have perfected Your creation which You formed.
يا اله الأرواح ورب الأجساد، الذي بمشورته الخفية اتحدت النفس بالجسد، أيضاً كإرادتك الصالحة أكملت جبلتك التي خلقتها،
Ouoh pikahi men aktacyof e~pikahi: pip~neuma de akywhem m~mof harok: ouoh akwp m~mof nem nimon/ eyouab.
And have caused the earth to return to the earth, but have called the soul to thyself and have enclosed it in Your holy mansions.
And have caused the earth to return to the earth, but have called the soul to thyself and have enclosed it in Your holy mansions.
ورددت التراب إلى التراب، والروح دعوتها إليك وأسكنتها في المنازل المقدسة.

Vn/b P[oic: pina/t: swp e~rok n~ouparay/k/ e~couab: ]'u,/ n~te tekbwki m~mona,/ ta(nim): yai e~taci~ harok w~ Vnou] n~te ni'u,/ nem nicwma nem nip~neuma nem en,ai niben e~takyamiw~ou: n/e~tounau e~rwou nem n/e~tencenau e~rwou an.

Master, Lord, merciful Lord; receive as a holy trust the soul of Your handmaid the nun, (...), who has departed to You, O God of souls and bodies and spirits, and all things that You have formed, visible and invisible.

Master, Lord, merciful Lord; receive as a holy trust the soul of Your handmaid the nun, (...), who has departed to You, O God of souls and bodies and spirits, and all things that You have formed, visible and invisible.
أيها السيد الرب الرحيم، اقبل إليك هذه الوديعة الطاهرة التي هي نفس عبدتك الراهبة (...) التي أتت إليك يا اله الأنفس والأجساد والأرواح. يامن خلقت كل شئ ما يرى وما لايرى.
Ariv~meui~ P[oic m~pecjinvwt harok: nem niqici e~tacsopou e~rok eybe ]helpic n~oujai e~tecnakw] n~cwc: e~oua~nactacic n~te ouwnq nem ouemton n~te ouhir/n/.
Remember, O Lord, her flight to You, and the labours which she went through for the hope of salvation which she sought after, unto resurrection of life, and the rest in peace.
Remember, O Lord, her flight to You, and the labours which she went through for the hope of salvation which she sought after, unto resurrection of life, and the rest in peace.
اذكر يارب التجاءها إليك، والأتعاب التي كابدتها من أجل رجاء الخلاص الذي طلبته إلى قيامة الحياة ونياح السلام،
Niparap~twma de nem nicung~nwm/ n~niswni n~te nirwmi ,au nac e~bol: hwc a~gayoc n~refnai n~ouon niben.
Her transgressions, and her yielding to human infirmities forgive her, who are good and merciful to all.
Her transgressions, and her yielding to human infirmities forgive her, who are good and merciful to all.
الزلات ومشورات الضعف البشري اغفرها لها، إذ أنك صالح ورحيم لكل أحد،

Aksantoujoc qen pekh~mot marecjimi n~ou,~bob qen kenf n~Abraam nem Icaak nem Iakwb: qen v~ouwini n~te n/etonq: qen ou,wra n~te oumanemton: nem ]a~polaucic e~te pima e~tafvwt e~bol n~q/tf n~je pim~kah n~h/t nem ]lup/ nem pifia~hom.

Having freed her by Your grace, let her find refreshment in the bosom of Abraham and Isaac and Jacob: in the light of the living: in the region of rest and repose, the place out of which grief, sorrow and groaning have fled away.

Having freed her by Your grace, let her find refreshment in the bosom of Abraham and Isaac and Jacob: in the light of the living: in the region of rest and repose, the place out of which grief, sorrow and groaning have fled away.
وإذا أنقذتها بنعمتك فلتجد راحة في حضن إبراهيم واسحق ويعقوب، في نور الأحياء في كورة النياح والراحة، الموضع الذي هرب منه الحزن والكآبة والتنهد.

~Arikataxioin de on n~tekswpi n~nom] nem ouparamiyia~ n~te n/etoi n~emkah n~h/t: je n~yok v/e~tak]nom] nan qen nenhojhej t/rou: ak] nan n~oujin j~vi/~] n~te ouw~ou e~v~ma n~te oup~neuma n~te oumets~lahn~h/t.
Graciously grant comfort and consolation unto them that grieve; for You have comforted us all in our afflictions, and have given us an exchange of glory in the place of the spirit of grief.
Graciously grant comfort and consolation unto them that grieve; for You have comforted us all in our afflictions, and have given us an exchange of glory in the place of the spirit of grief.
تفضل أيضاً أن تكون راحة وعزاء لحزانى القلوب، لأنك أنت الذي عزيتنا في جميع شدائدنا، وأعطيتنا اقتناء المجد عوضا عن روح الحزن.
Wli e~bol haron n~emkahn~h/t niben hiten ]helpic n~te nia~gayon eyn/ou.
Remove from us all sorrows through the hope of the good things to come.
Remove from us all sorrows through the hope of the good things to come.
انزع عنا كل حزن بواسطة رجاء الخيرات العتيدة،
Ouoh v/ men e~takolf e~pima e~tem~mau maemton naf.
And whomsoever You have taken to that place, grant him rest.
And whomsoever You have taken to that place, grant him rest.
والذين أخذتهم إلى ذلك الموضع نيحهم،
Anon de hwn qen paima nai nan: ouoh a~reh e~ron ouoh nahmen e~bolha pethwou niben: hiten pekmonogen/c n~s/ri Pen[oic ouoh Pennou] ouoh Pencwt/r I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
And we, too, here, have mercy on us, and keep us and save us from all evil. Through Your only-begotten Son, our Lord, God, and Savior Jesus Christ.
And we, too, here, have mercy on us, and keep us and save us from all evil. Through Your only-begotten Son, our Lord, God, and Savior Jesus Christ.
ونحن أيضاً الذين ههنا ارحمنا، واحفظنا، ونجنا من كل شر، من قبل ابنك الوحيد ربنا وإلهنا ومخلصنا يسوع المسيح
Vai e~te e~bol hitotf e~re piw~ou nem pitaio nem pia~mahi nem ]p~rockun/cic: erp~repi nak nemaf: nem Pip~neuma eyouab n~reftanqo ouoh n~o~mooucioc nemak.
Through whom the glory, the honor, the dominion, and the worship are due unto You, with Him and the Holy Spirit, the Giver of Life, who is of one essence with You,
Through whom the glory, the honor, the dominion, and the worship are due unto You, with Him and the Holy Spirit, the Giver of Life, who is of one essence with You,
هذا الذي من قبله المجدُ والكرامةُ والعزُ والسجودُ تليقُ بِكَ معه، ومع الروحِ القدسِ المحيى المساوي لكَ.
}nou nem n~c/ou niben nem sa e~neh n~te nie~neh t/rou: a~m/n.
now and at all times and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
now and at all times and unto the age of all ages. Amen.
الآن وكل أوان وإلى دهر الدهور كلها. آمين.
